channel.title: [ALLSTAR] [317] Setting animation works at certain places but not others?
channel.description: I've been trying to make firemaking more "legit" (along with crafting lol) but when I use the chisel on a gem (or a tinderbox on wood), it does EVERYTHING, except for do the animation (885, for firemaking 733) I've got no idea why it won't do the animation. Also I need help with Tree Stump replacement (regrowing trees)

well you should search it up and fix it [€a$y]

item.title: [ALLSTAR] [317] Setting animation works at certain places but not others?
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

lemme_winks_:

idk why you expect help when you are providing no examples or the code for what you are failing to do

I don’t know why it’s not working some places and working in others. I’m simply baffled.
It works in object clicks, but not using an item on an object / on another item. I don’t get it

item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:6, topic:430384”][quote author=TheLetterQArousesMe link=topic=533068.msg3896405#msg3896405 date=1327344172]

Do you know of any other thing that uses an animation? And if so, can you find that method?

… Well all I can tell you is that it works in case (ID) but not in the itemused thing (what I’m using for crafting & firemaking), forgot to make the title make sense, sorry about that.
[/quote]Whatever the method is in the case that is working, applie that to the item used on item methods.[/quote]
Okay, will do
